author: Simon Difford
description: Vodka replaces cachaça in this Caipirinha-style drink.
name: Caipirovska
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin
SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass
